name: console.log
description: <!-- To demonstrate :"How console.log() can degrade your performance" --> # Main Objective is to know how console.log() can degrade your performance # Secondary Objective is to get the performance difference between console.log() and winston logger <!-- The experiment will be done in 2 go: -->     1 using console.log() to print 100 lines of text     2. using winston logger to print 100 lines of text
